ygData.subject: Energonians at the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: Tarantulas, Black Aracnia, and Quickstrike entered the Ice Cave to see Hell Beast sitting in Megatron s command chair. At first, Tarantulas didnt notice, but

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Tarantulas, Black Aracnia, and Quickstrike entered the Ice Cave to see 
Hell Beast sitting in Megatron's command chair. At first, Tarantulas didnt 
notice, but with the distressed look on some of the bots faces he began to 
investigate.
       "Whats wrong?" He rhasped in his shrill voice. He went right up to 
Hell Beast.
       Hell Beast turned a solem face to him. "Megatron is dead. That is all 
we know for now, but then agian he just may turn up one day. No one can say 
anything for sure in this war." 
       Tarantulas took the news with a bit of relief. Megatron was a jerk 
most of the time, and was lazy. Hell Beast seemed to be more capable of a 
leader.
       "Now, I am to resume command. But, I am not commanding Predacons 
anymore. From now on we shall be part of the Neo Decepticon Empire! And we 
shall be the most powerful and dominant faction on this planet. No longer are 
we Predacons of the distance and cold Cybertron, we are Predacons of Earth. 
And things are much different here." He said.

       Ominous gave a pass at the Ark and launched four Energon missles while 
the two other shuttles sent down energon laser fire. 

--part1_8a.24fc100.27b9a4a2_boundary
